name: Brooklyn Mango
description: Brooklyn Mango, bred by Dr. Underground, is a hybrid that combines Ed Rosenthal Super Bud with NYC Diesel. The resulting buds carry a mix of diesel and tropical fruit flavors, like pineapple, mango, and lemon. The effects of Brooklyn Mango are a mix of cerebral energy with calm and comforting body relaxation.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Aroused, Uplifted, Happy, Talkative, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Stress, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Anxious
